allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 0: Project setup and foundation

- Initialize React + Vite + TypeScript project
- Install dependencies: React Router, Supabase, Tailwind, Recharts, date-fns
- Configure Tailwind with Australian color scheme \(deep blue + green\)
- Set up folder structure \(components, pages, lib, hooks, types, constants, contexts\)
- Create comprehensive Supabase setup guide with database schema
- Add .env.example for configuration

Generated with Claude Code
https://claude.com/claude-code

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 1: Authentication and Onboarding

- Create Supabase client with TypeScript database types
- Implement AuthContext for global auth state management
- Build reusable AuthForm component
- Create Login and Signup pages with error handling
- Build multi-step Onboarding wizard \(5 steps\):
  * Welcome screen
  * FIRE income goal
  * Timeline \(years to FIRE\)
  * Risk tolerance slider \(1-10\)
  * Strategy preference \(Buy & Hold, Value-Add, Development, Mixed\)
- Implement protected routes and auth redirects
- Auto-redirect logic based on onboarding completion
- Add LoadingSpinner for better UX
- Create basic Dashboard with FIRE goals display

Generated with Claude Code
https://claude.com/claude-code

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 2: Property Management

- Create Australian constants for states, property types
- Build comprehensive formatters utility \(currency, dates, calculations\)
- Build reusable PropertyForm component with full validation
- Create AddProperty page with tier limit enforcement
- Build PropertyCard component displaying key metrics
- Update Dashboard to fetch and display properties
- Add portfolio summary \(total value, equity, debt, LVR\)
- Build PropertyDetail page with:
  * Property information display
  * Key metrics cards \(value, growth, equity, LVR\)
  * Value history table
- Add routes for /add-property and /property/:id
- Implement free tier 2-property limit with upgrade prompt
- Use Australian formatting \(DD/MM/YYYY, AUD currency\)

Generated with Claude Code
https://claude.com/claude-code

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 3: Cashflow Tracking

- Build CashflowEntryForm component for monthly data entry:
  * Income: Rental income \(weekly/monthly frequency\)
  * Expenses: Mortgage, Insurance \(annual\), Rates/Strata \(quarterly\), Other
  * Notes field for additional information
  * Edit/delete functionality

- Build CashflowSummary component with automatic calculations:
  * Weekly, Monthly, Annual summaries
  * Total income, expenses, and net cashflow
  * Visual indicators for positive/negative cashflow

- Build CashflowChart component using Recharts:
  * Bar chart showing Income vs Expenses vs Net
  * Custom tooltip with detailed breakdown
  * Responsive container for all screen sizes

- Build Cashflow page with full features:
  * Property selector dropdown
  * Add/edit cashflow entries
  * Historical entries table
  * Summary cards and charts
  * Empty states for better UX

- Update PropertyDetail with cashflow link
- Add /cashflow route to App.tsx

Generated with Claude Code
https://claude.com/claude-code

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
